trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hacienda Heights
There were no other sightings in Hacienda Heights on or around May 9th 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsi am a california state licensed branch 3 (wdo inspector #43953), or better known as a "termite" inspector. i take pix during my inspections to document my findings so later when i write my report, i can go back & review. i was in hacienda heights just finishing my inspection. later (today 5\10\13), while going over the pictures i had taken for this inspection, i noticed an anomoly in one of the last shots i took while facing west\north-west. hey folks, i am not claiming this to be a ufo! for all i know, it is some sort of lens flare or other explainable occurrence, but because it seems to have solidity and it is unlike anything i would usually see in the sky, i thought i'd send it to the experts for further analysis. maybe it's nothing at all, but i'll let you determine that. i heard nothing...i saw nothing...i felt nothing. i simply found a strange object in my picture and want you to take a look. to be honest, it looks a lot like a drywood termite swarmer (ironic), but a bug would not show up like this unless it was huge, like the size of a car---not to mention, drywood termites don't start their swarming season until september. again, i'm not holding my breath here. p.s.---i was using my iphone 5 to take the pictures
Summary: Found anomoly in picture / did not see
